description.@en: You command the creature to do your bidding; its response is obedience.

data.distance: Any one creature you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: Your words only serve to antagonize the creature. Rearing up, it has a new-found passion â€“ to kill and eat you! The creature can add a 1D6 Fury Die to Total Damage whenever it strikes you in the next three minutes.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the creature you touch (providing they are considered to be a Beast) is yours to command for exactly one minute. Note that if you attack the creature or cause it further harm, the spell ends immediately.

reagents.@en: The tooth of a creature type you wish to tame (expended)
